content.rendered:
Directed by Madhur Bhandarkar.

Written by Madhur Bhandarkar. Sanjay Chhel. Kapil Chopra. Anil Pandey.

Cast Kirti Kulhari(Indu Sarkar). Tota Roy Chowdhury(Naveen Sarkar). Neil Nitin Mukesh(Sanjay Gandhi). Ankur Vikal(Activist Shivam Reddy). Sheeba Chaddha(Meklah). Parvin Dabas(I B Officer). Abhinav Sharma(Shreedhar). Anupam Kher(Nana Pradhan). Manav Vij(Inspector Satinder Sodhi). Rashmi Jha(Farzana). Ganesh Kumar(Muslim Chacha).Ishika Taneja. Bikramjeet Kanwarpal(Kela Chand).Mujtaba Aziz Khan.Jashn Agnihotri. Simran Gangwani(Manju). Abhishek Gautam(Model). Prince Abhimanyu Singh Gill(College Boy (credit only)). Prince Abhimanyu Singh Gill(College Boy (credit only)). Nitanshi Goel(Young Indu). Zakir Hussain(Inspector Mishra). Rahul Jaiswal(Self). Mohan Kapur(Sahani (as Mohan Kapoor)). Tiwari Nirmal(Vithal manjhi). Purohit Pankaj(Nihal Pandey).Alok Nath Pathak. Varun Singh Rajput(Nihaal). Atul Satfale(Parents (as Atul D. Satfale)). Lokendra Singh(Inspector). Ankur Tandon(Ashok). Aparna Upadhyay(Principal). Supriya Vinod(Indira Gandhi)

Language Hindi.

Producers Madhur Bhandarkar. Sanjay Dawra. Shahin Ezaz. Bharat B. Shah.

Production Bhandarkar Entertainment. Mega Bolywood Private.
